review: This product is very good. It has mucho movies, TV shows and more. One thing I am disappointed about is YouTube. I wanted to show a video on it and did a search and there was no way to search on YouTube for what you are looking for. Other than that it is a very good device to have.
author: Anita Mobley

review: I plugged it in and it went right to work.  Super easy to use.  While I have a "smart" TV, and can access Hulu and Netflix from the TV itself, I couldn't get Amazon Prime through it.  :(So, bought this and love it.  The voice search is great.
author: M Christian Halstead

review: I've become a cord cutter and although at first I was lost on what to watch, after a year I have found my favorites.  I am glad that I did it.  Setup was easy, choices have been adequate for me, and the continued upgrading and new choices keeps me entertained.  I recommend.
author: Antigone
